entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
